column1: Uchi////Man! This place is so tasty
column2: and the ambience was so vibrant. Our waiter was very nice
column3: and accommodated for everything we needed. Not to mention the food was also very delicious
column4: despite the small portions and food decorations
column5: By the end of the meal we were completely full. I have to recommend the fried milk and the coconut dessert as those two were my favorites. They even aged us small Personal desserts at the end of our stay. I also recommend the hot rock with wag you beef as I found that to be very creative and fun to cook. Not to mention the pork belly was also very well done as the outside layer was very crispy and the inside was fatty and juicy. I hope you give this restaurant a try and tell me what you think!
